sourcesContent:
import { createSlice } from '@reduxjs/toolkit'
import gameField from './Gamefield'

import reducers from './reducers'

const initialState = {
    gameField,
    turn: 'w',
    turns: { b: 'w', w: 'b' },
    colors: ['rgb(255,195,151)', 'rgb(39,39,39)'],
    selected: null,
    check: null,
    promoted: null,
    enpassing: null,
    lastMoves: [],
    nextMoves: [],
    castlingMoved: [],
    coverMoves: []
}

const chessSlice = createSlice({
    name: 'chess',
    initialState,
    reducers
})

export default chessSlice.reducer

export const {
    setNextMoves,
    setCheck,
    setSelected,
    setCoverMoves,
    movePiece,
    setPromoted
} = chessSlice.actions
